alert.note: Alert for Upper Bucks; Western Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Montgomery and west central Bucks Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Green Lane, or 18 miles south of Allentown, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lansdale, Quakertown, Souderton, Hatfield, Schwenksville, Green Lane, Spring Mount, Telford, Sellersville, Pennsburg, Red Hill, Trumbauersville, Harleysville and Kulpsville. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 31 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
